Articles.Content:
So I was bored one day and decided to create a full scale model of the Kerbol System in my CAD software (with accurate orbital characteristics given by the wiki). I didn't texture anything so they're all just solid color. I also started on a model of the actual solar sytem, but with the extra bodies, inclinations, and eccentricities, it may take a while. Does anyone else have any KSP CAD models?

Overview of the system with orbits shown. Can't see any bodies since it's in perspective view mode and zoomed out real far.

Kerbin system with Kerbol in the background

Jool system. You can see how much smaller Bop and Pol are than the other three moons.
Well, something to do when you're bored. Eventually, perhaps you could accurately model and texture the entire Kerbol system correctly! Its a big task, but this is only the beginning,
